This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS CSS.supports('color', "\\rgb(10, 20, 30)") should return true 
PASS e.style['color'] = "\\rgb(10, 20, 30)" should set the value 
PASS Serialization should round-trip after setting e.style['color'] = "\\rgb(10, 20, 30)" 
PASS CSS.supports('border-color', "\\#ff0000") should return false 
PASS e.style['border-color'] = "\\#ff0000" should not set the value 
PASS CSS.supports('background-color', "rgb\\(255\\,0\\,0\\)") should return false 
PASS e.style['background-color'] = "rgb\\(255\\,0\\,0\\)" should not set the value 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
